query: Are loyalty programs losing power compared to community events?

confidence.note: Directional evidence: 9 sources • 7 domains • 9 in-window / 0 background • support coverage 0%

title: Are loyalty programs losing power compared to community events?
highlights: Black Friday weekend is the decisive high-value capture window; small footfall gains convert to outsized early purchases [^1].
Event-led discovery outperforms loyalty-driven lifts when media value and creator reach are layered on store activations [^3].
Keep promo depth steady; measure incremental visits, event-attributed transactions, and buyer activity share in daily buckets.
executive_summary: We must raise early-window buyer share and footfall during the discount-heavy holiday without leaning on deeper loyalty discounts over the next six weeks. Prioritize place-based activations that target **10–15%** foot-traffic uplift (stretch **≥25%**) and move early-window share from **12–15%** toward **20–30%**, while keeping event CPA at or below **0.80×** baseline [^1]. Favor a store-as-studio / media-led holiday with brand collabs timed to Black Friday weekend, and within 30 days marketing, store ops, and partnerships must reallocate planned loyalty discount spend into in-store activations, local media/creator slots, and POS event attribution [^1][^3]. Measure success daily via buyer activity share vs promo intensity and confirm QR redemption at **≥5%** of footfall to validate discovery-to-buy conversion [^1].
top_operator_moves: Reallocate a defined portion of planned loyalty discount budget to fund 1–2 branded store activations per priority market timed around Black Friday weekend.
Instrument event vs control at store level: daily footfall sensors, POS event tags, QR redemption tracking, and buyer activity share reporting.
Activate local media and creator placements tied to store-as-studio content and stop any additional loyalty depth increases during the test window.

scope.topic: Are loyalty programs losing power compared to community events?

unified_target_pack.paired_metric: Track buyer activity share vs promo intensity side by side

scope.operator_job_story: How to drive higher early-window buyer share and footfall during the discount-heavy holiday without relying on deeper loyalty discounts in the next 6 weeks.
search_shaped_variants: Test community events to lift Black Friday weekend footfall without increasing loyalty discounts
How to shift holiday spend from loyalty redemptions to event-driven discovery in 6 weeks
Plan a store-as-studio brand collab that raises early-window share to 20% while holding promo depth
Measure buyer activity share vs promo intensity for event-led vs loyalty-led holiday tactics
scope.evidence_note: Directional evidence: 9 sources • 7 domains • 9 in-window / 0 background • support coverage 0%

pilot_spec.primary_move: Run short-run, brand-collab store events in four flagships over Nov 24–Dec 1 to raise early-window buyer share to 20–30% while holding promo depth and keeping event CPA ≤0.8× baseline.

early_window_share.label: Early-window buyer share (Nov 24–Dec 1)
early_window_share.target_text: 20–30% of holiday buyers occur in the early-window; track daily vs last year

qr_redemption.label: QR redemption rate per counted footfall
qr_redemption.target_text: ≥ 5% of counted footfall redeem QR offers during the event

foot_traffic_uplift.label: Store foot traffic uplift vs baseline
foot_traffic_uplift.target_text: 10–15% uplift vs baseline daily footfall during event days (stretch goal ≥ 25%)

promo_sku_share.label: Promo SKU share of assortment (daily)
promo_sku_share.target_text: Maintain promo SKU share roughly equal to last year; capture daily percent of assortment on promo (LY value TBD)

role_actions.Head of Retail: Deploy the four-store pilot (holiday_event_vs_loyalty_early_window), enable door counts and POS event tags, staff each event, and report daily foot_traffic_uplift and qr_redemption to the dashboard.
role_actions.Head of Partnerships: Lock one brand collaborator per store for the pilot, confirm co-owned creative with QR call-to-action, and commit partner channels to drive event walk-ins measured by qr_redemption and early_window_share.
role_actions.Head of Marketing: Execute and pace paid media to hit event_cpa ≤ 0.8× baseline over Nov 27–30, route traffic to store event pages, and pause or reallocate spend if CPA or early_window_share miss targets after 48 hours.
role_actions.Finance: Approve a capped event budget conditional on projected event_cpa ≤ 0.8× baseline and minimum expected foot_traffic_uplift of 10%; stop additional spend if event_cpa > 0.8× after the first two event days.
role_actions.Merch + Analytics: Measure early_window_share versus daily promo_sku_share, publish a paired report each morning, and recommend hold/expand actions if early_window_share ≥ 20% while promo_sku_share ≈ LY.

pilot_spec_issues: role_action Merch + Analytics missing from owner_roles
spec_notes: role_action Merch + Analytics missing from owner_roles
